concept.title: EXPLAIN
concept.shortdesc: The EXPLAIN statement when used before any N1QL statement, provides information about the execution plan for the statement.

conbody.p: User executing the EXPLAIN statement must have the privileges required for the N1QL statement that is being explained. For more details about user roles, see .
To execute the following statement, user must have the Query Insert privilege on `travel-sample` and the Query Select privilege on `beer-sample`.

p.codeblock: EXPLAIN INSERT INTO `travel-sample` (KEY foo, VALUE bar) SELECT foo, bar FROM `beer-sample`

conbody.p: To execute the following statement, user must have the Query Insert, Query Update, and Query Select privileges on testbucket.

p.codeblock: EXPLAIN UPSERT INTO testbucket VALUES ("key1", { "a" : "b" }) RETURNING meta().cas
